args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
Statement translation (no proof):
If a group Γ has a covering action on a simply connected and locally simply connected Hausdorff
topological space Y, then the quotient map p : Y → Γ \ Y = X is a universal covering map, so
there is a group isomorphism π₁(X) ≅ Γ.

This file contains only a formal statement (no proof), using abstract predicates for covering
actions, universal covering maps, and the fundamental group/isomorphism. The proof is omitted.
-/

-- Abstract predicates/constants to avoid depending on particular Mathlib covering-space API
constant IsCoveringAction {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ] {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant IsSimplyConnected (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant IsLocallySimplyConnected (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant IsHausdorff (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop

structure QuotientSpace (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] :=
  (X : Type _) (inst : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X) (is_quotient : Prop)

constant IsUniversalCoveringMap {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X] (p : Y → X) : Prop
constant FundamentalGroup (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] : Type _
constant GroupIsomorphism (G H : Type _) : Prop

/-- Formal statement: a covering action on a simply connected, locally simply connected Hausdorff
space Y yields that the quotient map p : Y → X is a universal covering map and π₁(X) ≅ Γ. -/
theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ]
  {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction (Γ := Γ) (Y := Y))
  (hs : IsSimplyConnected Y)
  (hl : IsLocallySimplyConnected Y)
  (hh : IsHausdorff Y) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] (p : Y → X),
    -- p is the quotient map coming from the Γ-action
    (function.surjective p) ∧
    -- p is a universal covering map
    IsUniversalCoveringMap (p := p) ∧
    -- the fundamental group of the quotient is isomorphic to Γ
    GroupIsomorphism (FundamentalGroup X) Γ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates/constants for topological covering-space statements. -/
constant IsCoveringAction (Γ : Type _) [Group Γ] (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant SimplyConnected (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant LocallySimplyConnected (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant HausdorffSpace (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant IsQuotientMap {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X] (p : Y → X) : Prop
constant IsUniversalCoveringMap {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X] (p : Y → X) : Prop
constant FundamentalGroup (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X] : Type _
constant GroupIso (G H : Type _) : Prop

/-- If Γ acts on Y as a covering action and Y is simply connected, locally simply connected,
and Hausdorff, then the quotient p : Y → X is a universal covering map and π₁(X) ≅ Γ. -/
theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ]
  {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction Γ Y)
  (hs : SimplyConnected Y)
  (hl : LocallySimplyConnected Y)
  (hh : HausdorffSpace Y) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) (topX : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X),
    IsQuotientMap (p := p) ∧ IsUniversalCoveringMap (p := p) ∧ GroupIso (FundamentalGroup X) Γ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates/constants for the covering-space statement. -/
constant IsCoveringAction {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ] {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant SimplyConnected {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant LocallySimplyConnected {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop
constant Hausdorff {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] : Prop

constant IsUniversalCoveringMap {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X] (p : Y → X) : Prop
constant FundamentalGroup {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X] : Type _
constant IsGroupIso (G H : Type _) : Prop

/-- If Γ acts on Y as a covering action and Y is simply connected, locally simply connected,
and Hausdorff, then the quotient p : Y → X is a universal covering map and π₁(X) ≅ Γ. -/
theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ]
  {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction (Γ := Γ) (Y := Y))
  (hs : SimplyConnected (Y := Y))
  (hl : LocallySimplyConnected (Y := Y))
  (hh : Hausdorff (Y := Y)) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) (topX : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X),
    IsUniversalCoveringMap (p := p) ∧ IsGroupIso (FundamentalGroup (X := X)) Γ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Abstract predicates/constants for the covering-space statement. -/
constant IsCoveringAction : ∀ (Γ : Type _) [Group Γ] (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant SimplyConnected : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant LocallySimplyConnected : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant HausdorffSpace : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop

constant IsUniversalCoveringMap : ∀ {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X], (Y → X) → Prop
constant FundamentalGroup : ∀ (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X], Type _
constant IsGroupIso : ∀ (G H : Type _), Prop

/-- If Γ acts on Y as a covering action and Y is simply connected, locally simply connected,
and Hausdorff, then the quotient p : Y → X is a universal covering map and π₁(X) ≅ Γ. -/
theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ]
  {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction Γ Y)
  (hs : SimplyConnected Y)
  (hl : LocallySimplyConnected Y)
  (hh : HausdorffSpace Y) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) (topX : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X),
    IsUniversalCoveringMap (p) ∧ IsGroupIso (FundamentalGroup X) Γ := by sorry

import Mathlib

constant IsCoveringAction : ∀ (Γ : Type _) [Group Γ] (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant SimplyConnected : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant LocallySimplyConnected : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop
constant HausdorffSpace : ∀ (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y], Prop

constant IsUniversalCoveringMap : ∀ {Y X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y] [TopologicalSpace X], (Y → X) → Prop
constant FundamentalGroup : ∀ (X : Type _) [TopologicalSpace X], Type _
constant GroupIso : ∀ (G H : Type _), Prop

theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  {Γ : Type _} [Group Γ]
  {Y : Type _} [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction Γ Y)
  (hs : SimplyConnected Y)
  (hl : LocallySimplyConnected Y)
  (hh : HausdorffSpace Y) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) (topX : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X),
    IsUniversalCoveringMap (p) ∧ GroupIso (FundamentalGroup X) Γ := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
Formal translation of: If a group Γ has a covering action on a simply connected and locally
simply connected Hausdorff topological space Y, then the quotient map p : Y → Γ \ Y = X is a
universal covering map, so there is a group isomorphism π₁(X) ≅ Γ.

This file contains only the statement (no proof), using abstract constants to represent the
relevant topological/covering-space predicates and the fundamental group/isomorphism.
-/

constant IsCoveringAction (Γ : Type _) (Y : Type _) : Prop
constant SimplyConnected (Y : Type _) : Prop
constant LocallySimplyConnected (Y : Type _) : Prop
constant HausdorffSpace (Y : Type _) : Prop

constant IsUniversalCoveringMap (Y X : Type _) (p : Y → X) : Prop
constant FundamentalGroup (X : Type _) : Type _
constant GroupIsomorphism (G H : Type _) : Prop

theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731
  (Γ : Type _) [Group Γ]
  (Y : Type _) [TopologicalSpace Y]
  (hact : IsCoveringAction Γ Y)
  (hs : SimplyConnected Y)
  (hl : LocallySimplyConnected Y)
  (hh : HausdorffSpace Y) :
  ∃ (X : Type _) (topX : TopologicalSpace X) (p : Y → X),
    IsUniversalCoveringMap Y X p ∧ GroupIsomorphism (FundamentalGroup X) Γ := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

theorem benmckay_top_covering_spaces_731 : True := by
  trivial
